test.name: TC14: View the available offered courses (GET REQUEST METHOD)

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=mysession, url=http://127.0.0.1:8000, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0
